features: ✔️ Design-This glass restaurant tall candle holder has tall, medium and short long stem glass lamp holders. This modern and stylish candle holder adds a perfect highlight to your home, garden or event decoration. Each candle has a long stem and is very transparent. The unique design is attractive, decorative and functional.

✔️ Application-Suitable for column candles, floating candles, LED candles and small tea wax. This modern candle holder is very suitable for special events, weddings, modern home decoration, parties, table setting and gifts can also be used as a vase, as a flower decoration displayed in the center of your party event table.

✔️ Size-3 sizes: This glass candlestick set comes with high, medium and short glass candlesticks. The tallest candlestick is 26 cm (10.2 inches) high, the medium candlestick is 23 cm (9 inches) high, and the shortest candlestick is 20 cm (7.9 inches). You can display them together in order of size, or even display them separately in different rooms-they look great!
✔️ 3-piece set – In the box, you will receive 3 hurricane candlesticks of different sizes (not including candles as shown).

✔️ Warranty-If the glass vase is damaged during transportation, please contact us, we will provide you with a replacement service as soon as possible. The picture does not include the small items on the candlestick, they are only used to display items.
